items.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Upgraded to ‘Hold’ by Jefferies — But Analysts Still Cautious on AI
items.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is one of the 10 Trending AI Stocks on News and Ratings. On July 2, Jefferies upgraded the stock to “Hold” from underperform and raised the price target to roughly $188 per share from $171. Analyst Edison Lee highlighted Apple’s 15% annual growth in sales volume in April and May as a catalyst behind […]
